TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpCookiesSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookiesSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Web 应用程序所使用的 Cookie 的属性。

span.span: Configures properties for cookies used by a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `httpCookies` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpCookies` section of a configuration file. 它定义默认情况下应用于应用程序发出的所有 cookie 的设置, 除非发出 cookie 的代码覆盖它们。It defines the settings applied by default to all cookies issued by the application, unless the code issuing the cookie overrides them. `httpCookies`元素的一个目标是支持`HttpOnly`使用 cookie。One objective of the `httpCookies` element is to support the use of `HttpOnly` cookies. `HttpOnly`Internet Explorer 6 中引入`HttpOnly`了 cookie (具有特性的 cookie), 以帮助降低跨站点脚本的风险。`HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting. `HttpOnly`属性阻止通过客户端脚本访问 cookie。The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script. `HttpOnly` Cookie 中包含的任何信息都不太可能泄露给黑客或恶意网站。Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site. 有关详细信息, 请在 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) 中搜索 "HttpOnly"。For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly." > [!NOTE] > 根据值为 的节属性,可以读取和写入配置文件的相关部分的信息。The can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property whose value is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否启用了浏览器的 Cookie 支持的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the support for the browser's cookie is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了 支持，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if support for the cookie is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `httpCookies`元素支持`HttpOnly`使用 cookie。The `httpCookies` element supports the use of `HttpOnly` cookies. `HttpOnly`Internet Explorer 6 中引入`HttpOnly`了 cookie (具有特性的 cookie), 以帮助降低跨站点脚本的风险。`HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting. `HttpOnly`属性阻止通过客户端脚本访问 cookie。The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script. `HttpOnly` Cookie 中包含的任何信息都不太可能泄露给黑客或恶意网站。Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site. 有关详细信息, 请在 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) 中搜索 "HttpOnly"。For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly." ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否需要安全套接字层 (SSL) 通信的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) communication is required.

value.span: 如果启用了 SSL，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性启用或禁用安全 cookie 属性的输出, 如 RFC 2109 中所述。The property enables or disables output of the secure cookie attribute as described in RFC 2109. 当由符合性浏览器使用时, cookie 只会通过 SSL/TLS 连接回发。When used by compliant browsers, the cookie will only be sent back over a connection using SSL/TLS. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 cookie 的 SameSite 属性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the SameSite attribute of the cookie.

value.span: 一个枚举值，它表示 cookie 的强制模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the enforcement mode of the cookie.

value.span: 如果应用程序面向 .NET Framework 4.7.2 或更高版本，则默认值为 ；否则默认值为 。
